rooms.description: Bohemian styled living room with open plan layout, incorporating natural colors and textures in line with Vastu guidelines for energy flow. It has ample space near the entrance to welcome positivity.
Open dining area integrated with the living space featuring a rustic yet modern Bohemian aesthetic. The layout considers Vastu by positioning it in the east for health and prosperity.
Fully equipped kitchen with a Bohemian touch and modern amenities. Designed for wheelchair accessibility with wide corridors and lowered countertops.
Master bedroom with Bohemian decor and ample natural light. Positioned in the south-west for peaceful energy as per Vastu principles.
Second bedroom with Bohemian aesthetics and sufficient storage. Aligns with Vastu by being placed in the north-west direction.
Third bedroom designed for children or guests with Bohemian charm. Vastu suggests this room be in the north-east to promote learning and growth.
Fourth bedroom with a cozy Bohemian setup. Placed in the west following Vastu for creativity and calm.
Fifth bedroom that adds extra space in a Bohemian style. Designed with Vastu principles, ideally located in the north for balanced energy.
Sixth bedroom offering additional living space with Bohemian design elements. Vastu encourages placement in the south-east for balance and stability.
Well-placed bathroom with accessible design features including grab bars and non-slip flooring. Vastu suggests placing it in the northeast for purity.
A balcony space offering outdoor relaxation and fresh air. Vastu principles support an east-facing balcony for morning light.
Private gym designed with accessibility in mind, featuring adjustable equipment and ample space. Vastu considerations have ensured that the gym is positioned to enhance health and well-being.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed to be wheelchair accessible with a wide opening and ramp.
Secondary entrance for service access ensuring ease of movement.
Windows in the living area to enhance natural light and ventilation, following Vastu for positive energy flow.
Kitchen windows designed for ample daylight while considering safety and airflow as per Vastu guidelines.
